about_the_game:
Welcome to l i m e n t i o n a l

Set in a liminal and surreal environment, you must explore and traverse puzzles to succeed as you become increasingly entrapped in the world and your mind.

l i m e n t i o n a l is a first-person platforming and parkour game with horror elements, and some emphasis on mental health. Traverse and explore the environments to dive deeper and unlock secrets, and collect elusive MAXIMS.

Horror

Experience a slow and psychological horror as you become increasingly entrapped in a surreal and liminal environment.

This Demo covers the first three levels of l i m e n t i o n a l . You shall experience the mechanics and puzzles, and a growing sense of horror.

content_descriptors.notes: The game explores topics of mental health, including anxiety and depression.

detailed_description:
Welcome to l i m e n t i o n a l

Set in a liminal and surreal environment, you must explore and traverse puzzles to succeed as you become increasingly entrapped in the world and your mind.

l i m e n t i o n a l is a first-person platforming and parkour game with horror elements, and some emphasis on mental health. Traverse and explore the environments to dive deeper and unlock secrets, and collect elusive MAXIMS.

Horror

Experience a slow and psychological horror as you become increasingly entrapped in a surreal and liminal environment.

This Demo covers the first three levels of l i m e n t i o n a l . You shall experience the mechanics and puzzles, and a growing sense of horror.
name: limentional Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700K CPU @ 3.70GHz 3.70 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700K CPU @ 3.70GHz 3.70 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

short_description: Trapped in a surreal and liminal environment and in your mind, you'll be pressed to use all your skills to find a way of escape.
